meanings.definition: relating to or forming a word by derivation
meanings.sent1: The derivational process helps create new words from old ones.
meanings.sent2: She studied the derivational aspect of language to understand word formation better.
meanings.sent3: The derivational puzzle game challenged her to create new words from given ones.
meanings.sent4: His derivational skills were like a magic wand, transforming ordinary words into extraordinary ones.
meanings.sent5: The derivational workshop made the concept of word formation crystal clear.

meanings.definition: involving or relating to the process of forming new words from existing ones
meanings.sent1: The derivational rules helped her understand how new words are created.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed exploring the derivational possibilities of the English language.
meanings.sent3: The derivational party game had everyone laughing as they created silly new words.
meanings.sent4: Her derivational creativity knew no bounds, inventing words that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The derivational journey through language was both fascinating and enlightening.
